definition.text: This indicator calculates an On Balance Volume (OBV) value and applies an exponential moving average (EMA) for comparison.

paragraphs.text: The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| OnBalanceVolumeEMA | OBVEMA | value, ema |
The parameters for the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "OBV EMA" Procedure Loop.
